voidfindertk.settings module

Configuration management for VoidFinderTK.

This module handles the creation, reading, and management of the configuration file for VoidFinderTK. It provides functionality to create an empty configuration, read an existing configuration, and store global settings.

The module automatically creates a default configuration file if it doesn’t exist and loads the settings into a global SETTINGS object.

Notes

The configuration is stored in YAML format and can be modified through:

  • Direct file manipulation

  • Environment variables (prefixed with VFTK_)

  • Local configuration file in the current working directory

voidfindertk.settings.CWD_CONF_PATH = PosixPath('/home/jorgefederico/updates/vftk_1109/vftk_updated/voidFinderProject/vftk.yaml')

Path to the current working directory configuration file

voidfindertk.settings.DEFAULT_CONF_PATH = PosixPath('/home/jorgefederico/.voidfindertk/vftk.yaml')

Path to the default configuration file

voidfindertk.settings.SETTINGS = _Settings(voidfindertk_version='0.0.1', created_at='2025-03-28T21:02:39.456459+00:00', zobov_path='/home/jorgefederico/updates/vftk_1109/vftk_updated/voidFinderProject/voidfindertk/zobov/src/', popcorn_path='/home/jorgefederico/updates/vftk_1109/vftk_updated/voidFinderProject/voidfindertk/svf_popcorn/popcorn_void_finder/Source')

Global settings

voidfindertk.settings.load_default_settings()

Load default settings.

Returns

_Settings

Default settings

Notes

If no configuration file is found, it is created with default values.

If a local configuration file is found, it is loaded and merged with the default settings.

Environment variables are also read and used to update the settings.

Priority:

  1. Environment variables

  2. Local configuration file

  3. Default configuration
